DOC.brief_summary: This study involve measure subject 's blood lipid response consume mixture dietary fat marine dairy origin vitamin supplement mixed milkshake , three separate day . The investigator hope learn different food ingredient influence metabolism HDL individual low blood level HDL cholesterol .
DOC.brief_title: Feeding Trial Determine How Combinations Different Dietary Bioactive Ingredients Influence High Density Lipoprotein ( HDL ) Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: This study partial randomize crossover study design determine consumption bioactive dietary ingredient various combination three separate test day influence postprandial lipoprotein metabolism participant low circulate HDL-cholesterol . The dietary ingredient include : Dairy phospholipid ( PC700 ) ; krill oil ( K ) ; lutein ( L ) ; Niacin Eligible participant arrive University California Davis ( UC Davis ) , Ragle Human Nutrition Center morning test day 10-12-hr overnight fast . Upon arrival participant fill questionnaire dietary medication intake physical activity past 72 hour ensure compliance . Compliant participant ' weight blood pressure measure fast blood draw take participant consume test meal form milkshake ( control , PC700KL , PC700KL + Niacin ) . On test day , participant give meal provide ample supply bottle water . Participants consume test meal water freely duration test day . Blood drawn serially 2 4 hour postprandially . Participants also ask provide 3 urine sample throughout study : 2 , 4 hour consumption milkshake . Participants test two additional separate test day first day separate two-week washout . The first two test day randomize , however third test day always contain niacin order require participant remain Ragle first two hour study monitor niacin flushing reaction . Participants option participate two three test day wish exclude niacin test day .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year Plasma HDL cholesterol ( Less 50 mg/dL ) History gastrointestinal disorder like Crohns disease , colitis , irritable bowel syndrome History cardiovascular event : stroke , heart attack , cardiac arrhythmia History peptic ulcer , gastritis History gout History care psychiatric condition ( schizophrenia depression associate response niacin ) Cancer Type 1 2 diabetes Known presence significant metabolic disease could impact result study ( hepatic , renal disease ) Low blood pressure ( defined 3 consecutive reading 100/60 mmHg screen ) Self report skin sensitivity ; self report rash easily Self report hot flash currently experience due menopause Hypersensitivity niacin Muscle disorder myasthenia gravis Pending surgery within next 3 month Known allergy study food ( shellfish , fish , nut , soy ) Known intolerance study food ( lactose intolerance ) More 1 serve fish per week Intake antiinflammatory supplemental fish , krill , borage , flax , primrose seed oil within last 12 week Intake dietary supplement consist concentrated soy isoflavones , resveratrol , dietary polyphenols identify modulators lipid within last 12 week Intake 20 mg lutein zeaxanthin per week Intake nicotinic acid ( niacin ) within last 12 week Intake anticoagulant , blood pressure heart medication within last 12 week Plan become pregnant next 6 month Recent initiation ( past 4 week ) exercise program Use tobacco product Excessive alcohol consumption ( 2 drinks/day men 1 drink/day woman )
